archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1041
archimate:Requirement.documentation: When you and a friend join and stay on $80 endless group, get an apple watch free.

properties.value: Just stress testing the ability to set up eligibility rules – have tried to understand how they are configured in the product catalogue but cant seem to find an example Such configuration is possible.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
